mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT(ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, USER_EMAIL, ROLE_TYPE) SELECT COALESCE(NULLIF(MAX(ID), 0), 0) + 1, #{username}, #{password}, #{userEmail}, #{roleType} FROM ACCOUNT ORDER BY MAX(ID) DESC

INSERT INTO EMAIL_AUTH(ID, USER_EMAIL, AUTH_CODE, CODE_SEND_DATE) SELECT COALESCE(NULLIF(MAX(ID), 0), 0) + 1, #{userEmail}, #{authCode}, TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') FROM EMAIL_AUTH ORDER BY MAX(ID) DESC
mapper.select: SELECT ID , RANDOM_ID , PAGE_ID , PAGE_DESCRIPTION FROM ACCOUNT_MY_PAGE WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT CASE when END_YMD is null then TRUE WHEN TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(START_YMD, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(END_YMD, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS ACCESSYN FROM ACCOUNT_MY_PAGE WHERE account_id = #{id} AND random_id = #{randomId}
